title: I Was a Woman but now I’m the Main Hero. - Novel Updates
tags: Betrayal   Broken Engagement   Early Romance   Engagement   Fantasy World   Female to Male   Kingdoms   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Maids   Male Protagonist   Marriage   Multiple POV   Oneshot   Otome Game   Reincarnated in a Game World   Royalty   Short Story   Villainess Noble Girls
author: Mitomi Gyoei   三十三　魚ゑい
description:
A short story about a hero(former girl) being reincarnated into the world of an Otome game they know well. However they then have the villainous girl and heroine stolen away from them. Only to be consoled by their best friend.
>
